ValidationRule.description: If specifying a Number of Housekeeping Hours, Number of Housekeeping Staff and Housekeeping Hourly Rate must be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !ISBLANK( Number_of_Housekeeping_Hours__c ), OR( ISBLANK( Number_of_Housekeeping_Staff__c ), ISBLANK( Housekeeping_Hourly_Rate__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If specifying a Number of Housekeeping Hours, Number of Housekeeping Staff and Housekeeping Hourly Rate must be populated
